ComicInfo.Summary:
Paolo, Abby and Tosh lead their assemblage of “disaster tourists” deep inside the Fu-kushima Exclusion Zone for what they expect to be a (relatively) mundane experi-ence…if radioactive hotspots, irradiated feral animals and the promise of swift and harsh arrest by authorities could be classified as mundane. But this is an ancient place with no shortage of legends or ghosts. And nobody told the Samurai they were com-ing!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Andy Clarke & José Villarrubia | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Jordan Raskin | 2 |
